Comment: It will come as no surprise to anyone that Kash Patel, who recently made national headlines for his tweet defending the arrest of a Milwaukee judge, has been using a **taxpayer-funded** government jet to attend sporting events and visit his girlfriend.    Nor, will it come as any surprise that a mere [2 years ago, Patel criticized then-FBI Director Christopher Wray for his use of the government's fleet of private aircraft for personal travel](https://www.cbsnews.com/amp/news/patel-fbi-director-government-jet/).    But, now that Patel is the director, he apparently sees this as simply a perk of his new job.
